name: 0-Page RPG Best Practices Guide
description:
Are one-page RPGs starting to seem longer and longer? Tired of trying to teach several entire paragraphs of rules to your one-shot group? Just go even smaller and play a 0-Page RPG!

Since you already have the rules, and I can't give that away, here's my 0-Page RPG Best Practices Guide. Hopefully, it will help you and your friends discover the rules to your very own, handmade, one-of-a-kind TTRPG system while you play.

Take "play to find out" to its illogical conclusion-- don't just find out what happens next in the story, play to find out how to play!

Inspired by improv comedy games, 1000 Blank White Cards, and a love of TTRPGs.
